WRITING.TITLE: Any married man should forget his mistakes...
WRITING.TEXT: ...there's no use in two people remembering the same thing.

WRITING.TITLE: When wearing a bikini, women reveal about 90% of their body ...
WRITING.TEXT: ... men are so polite they only look at the covered parts

WRITING.TITLE: You know that tingly little feeling you get when you like someone?
WRITING.TEXT: That's your common sense leaving your body
